jobs.title: Senior React Developer
jobs.description:
Lead frontend development for our SaaS platform using React 18, TypeScript, and Next.js. 5+ years experience required.

React Developer

Location: Torino (Hybrid/Remote possible)

Experience Required: 3+ years

About the Position

You'll join SCAI Tecno, part of DEDAGROUP, a leader in IT solutions for advanced markets. We're strengthening our project team working with a major Connected Vehicle sector client.

You'll be part of a friendly, collaborative team building cutting-edge IoT applications. If you love software development and want to work with前沿 technologies, join us!

Key Responsibilities

  • Create and maintain reusable components (HTML, CSS, TypeScript)
  • Use modules, directives, pipes and services to structure applications
  • Work with React and Angular services
  • Implement state management solutions
  • Backend communication using HttpClient
  • Manage async calls, error handling and data visualization

Technical Requirements

Must Have:

  • 3+ years frontend development experience
  • Advanced React knowledge
  • TypeScript and JavaScript expertise
  • HTML5/CSS3 proficiency
  • Angular experience
  • Object-oriented programming understanding
  • Clean code practices (TDD/BDD preferred)
  • REST Web Services and JSON experience
  • Git version control

Soft Skills

We're looking for someone with problem-solving skills, proactive attitude, willingness to mentor juniors, flexibility and motivation.

Dedicated to Growth

At the heart of every project - whether software, tech solution or consulting - are people working together. Our people are competent, curious, ambitious and tenacious. Dedication for us means continuous improvement, pursuing new goals, achieving results and teamwork.

We're committed to helping people grow to express their full potential and contribute to building a better future - for themselves, for Deda and for society.

We welcome applications from candidates of all genders, sexual orientations, ages, ethnicities and religious beliefs (in compliance with Italian Laws 198/2006, 215/2003, 216/2003).

Submitted CVs will be processed by Dedagroup S.p.A. for potential contractual relationships and may be shared within the Dedagroup companies as per our Privacy Policy. Accepted file formats: doc, docx or pdf (max 4MB).

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer (AWS)
jobs.description:
Why Join Us? CloudNova is revolutionizing cloud infrastructure with AI-driven automation. We need a DevOps expert to manage our Kubernetes clusters.

You'll:

  • Design Terraform modules for multi-region AWS deployments
  • Implement GitOps workflows with ArgoCD
  • Reduce EC2 costs by 30% via spot instance optimization
  • Develop SLAs/SLOs with Prometheus/Grafana

Perks: $5k/annual training budget, 4-day workweeks every August.

jobs.title: UX Researcher
jobs.description:
Impact: Conduct user research for Fortune 500 clients using mixed methods (surveys, diary studies, usability tests).

Tools We Use:

  • Qualtrics for quantitative analysis
  • Dovetail for qualitative insights
  • Figma for prototype testing

Ideal Candidate: 3+ years in enterprise UX research, fluent in German/English, with experience in accessibility audits (WCAG 2.1).

jobs.title: UX/UI Designer
jobs.description:
About the job

Join TechNova Solutions as a Senior Frontend Engineer where you'll lead the development of our next-generation SaaS platform. This is a remote position offering the opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies while collaborating with a global team of experts. We're looking for someone passionate about creating exceptional user experiences through clean, maintainable code.

Responsibilities:

  • Develop and maintain high-quality React applications using TypeScript
  • Implement state management solutions using Redux Toolkit
  • Optimize applications for maximum performance across devices
  • Collaborate with UX designers to implement pixel-perfect interfaces
  • Mentor junior developers and conduct code reviews
  • Work closely with backend teams to design API contracts

Requirements:

  • 5+ years professional experience with React.js
  • Expertise in TypeScript and modern JavaScript (ES6+)
  • Strong understanding of RESTful APIs and GraphQL
  • Experience with testing frameworks (Jest, React Testing Library)
  • Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and Docker
  • Excellent problem-solving and communication skills

Benefits:

  • Fully remote work with flexible hours
  • Competitive salary + annual bonus
  • Comprehensive health insurance
  • Annual tech budget for equipment/learning
  • Generous PTO policy (25 days + holidays)
  • Quarterly team retreats in exciting locations

jobs.title: Data Scientist
jobs.how_to_apply: Submit application through our AI screening bot
jobs.description:
About the job

CloudScale is seeking a DevOps Engineer to join our London team in a hybrid capacity. You'll be instrumental in building and maintaining our cloud infrastructure, ensuring high availability and security for our enterprise clients. This contract position offers the opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies in a fast-paced environment.

Responsibilities:

  • Design and implement AWS infrastructure using Terraform
  • Build and maintain CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions
  • Configure and optimize Kubernetes clusters
  • Implement monitoring and alerting solutions
  • Automate security and compliance checks
  • Collaborate with development teams on deployment strategies

Requirements:

  • 3+ years experience in DevOps or SRE roles
  • Expertise with AWS services (EC2, EKS, RDS, S3)
  • Strong knowledge of infrastructure as code (Terraform preferred)
  • Experience with containerization and orchestration tools
  • Knowledge of networking and security best practices
  • Certifications (AWS, Kubernetes) are a plus

Benefits:

  • Competitive daily rate
  • Flexible hybrid work arrangement
  • Professional development budget
  • Latest tech equipment provided
  • Potential for contract extension
  • Access to tech conferences and events

jobs.title: Technical Writer
jobs.description:
About the job

DigitalCreatives is looking for a talented UX/UI Designer to lead design for our fintech products in Barcelona. You'll create intuitive, accessible interfaces that simplify complex financial workflows while maintaining brand consistency across platforms.

Responsibilities:

  • Conduct user research and create personas
  • Design wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity mockups
  • Create and maintain design systems
  • Collaborate with product managers and developers
  • Conduct usability testing and iterate on designs
  • Stay current with design trends and accessibility standards

Requirements:

  • 4+ years experience in product design
  • Expertise in Figma and Adobe Creative Suite
  • Strong portfolio showcasing fintech or complex SaaS products
  • Understanding of frontend development constraints
  • Experience with design systems and component libraries
  • Fluent English (Spanish/Catalan a plus)

Benefits:

  • Beautiful office in central Barcelona
  • Annual salary reviews
  • Paid training and conference attendance
  • Flexible work hours
  • Private health insurance
  • Team creative retreats twice yearly
